data: zzCARD Post Fibrinolytic Heparin Infusion Low (Module)

Discontinue previous heparin, low molecular weight heparin, rivaroxaban, dabigatran, apixaban, fondaparinux and edoxaban orders.  Discontinue intramuscular injections.   If possible, avoid non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs (NSAIDS).
Initiate heparin IV bolus direct, then start initial heparin IV infusion

Initial heparin bolus. If patient on epidural infusion contact anesthesiology or pain management team STAT and do not start heparin without their approval. Maximum 4000 units/bolus dose. Use 10,000 unit/10 mL vial for IV bolus doses

Initial heparin bolus. If patient on epidural infusion contact anesthesiology or pain management team STAT and do not start heparin without their approval. Maximum 4000 units/bolus dose. Use 10,000 unit/10 mL vial for IV bolus doses
Subsequent heparin IV bolus for PPT less than 45 sec
Do not administer within first 6 hours of initiating heparin infusion. PRN Reason: Subsequent IV bolus for PTT less than 45 sec

Initial dosing infusion rate based on weight 26 to 35.9 kg:  Starting Rate: 400 unit/h    PTT-Adjusted Heparin Therapy Nomogram: LOW TARGET    Instructions: PTT goal range of 50 to 70 sec (Therapeutic) Initial PTT in 3 hours, then 6 hours later repeat PTT then every 6 hours until 2 consecutive PTTs are within therapeutic range, then monitor PTT once daily. No increase in heparin dose in first 6 hours of therapy.    For PTT of:  Less than 45 sec - Give Heparin IV bolus if ordered AND increase infusion rate by 3 mL/h (150 unit/h).   Call MRP if 2 consecutive PTTs less than 45 sec.  45 to 49 sec - Increase rate by 2 mL/h (100 unit/h)  50 to 70 sec - No change in infusion rate.   71 to 80 sec - Decrease rate by 1 mL/h (50 unit/h)  81 to 90 sec - Stop infusion for 30 min then restart infusion AND decrease rate by 2 mL/h (100 unit/h)  91 sec or greater - Stop infusion for 60 min then restart infusion AND decrease rate by 4 mL/h (200 unit/h). Call MRP if 2 consecutive PTTs greater than 90 sec. For surgical patients, call MRP if any PTT greater than 90 sec.
